unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial, especially now. We at XYZ Corp. see immense potential in fresh graduates from IIT Delhi and other top institutions. Our next drive starts 20/10/2024. Targeting roles in Bangalore and Chennai. Expecting a good turnout, similar to 15/08/2023. Salary packages start at Rs. 8 LPA. Register by 01/10/2024, 17:00 hrs IST. Looking forward to welcoming promising talent. Don't miss this golden opportunity!
normalised: Campus hiring is crucial, especially now. We at X Y Z Corp. see immense potential in fresh graduates from I I T Delhi and other top institutions.
